data.summary: As a native data scientist, I am the creator of datascientists.com, one of the largest global communities of data scientists, boasting over 195,000 members from more than 170 countries. I'm a Foreign Direct Investor in Bhutan Data Scientists, a community of slightly enlightened data scientists dedicated to projects that serve the betterment of humankind. With a strong foundation in the cancer research domain, I have developed various scientific software applications, most notably the OccIDEAS integrated database system for occupational exposure assessments. Additionally, I co-founded Data Logical Services Pty Ltd, a company committed to blending human creativity and imagination (Art) with business solutions.
data.headline: Data Scientist

position.title: Data Scientist
position.description: Generating power through knowledge for those that need it most.  With data exploding everywhere and technology’s unquenchable thirst for assimilating every aspect of our lives, now is the time of the data scientists.

givenRecommendation.text:
I am pleased to write this recommendation for Lachu Man Basnet, who recently completed a three-month internship (January to March 2025) at Bhutan Data Scientists Pvt. Ltd. During his time with us, Lachu consistently demonstrated qualities that distinguish him as an outstanding and promising young data scientist.

Lachu's communication skills are excellent, enabling him to articulate ideas clearly and collaborate effectively with team members across various projects. He possesses a remarkable ability to quickly grasp complex concepts—a rare and invaluable trait for someone so early in their professional journey.

One of Lachu’s greatest strengths lies in his exemplary capacity to design and develop high-quality solutions from early-stage ideas. He approaches problems with curiosity and creativity, rapidly iterating from concept to implementation with a maturity beyond his years. His work reflects both technical rigor and an intuitive understanding of end-user needs.

Lachu also brings with him above-average business acumen, demonstrated through his entrepreneurial success in building and running a commodities sourcing and distribution business in Bhutan. His practical business experience complements his data science skills, giving him a holistic perspective when solving real-world problems.

During his internship, Lachu led a significant project: the Nexus Big Data initiative, where he sourced and processed over 196,000 LinkedIn profiles to generate a dynamic network graph. This graph mapped connections between individuals based on shared attributes such as skills, employers, and countries. The impact of this project on our data science initiatives was substantial, and it showcased Lachu's capability to work at the intersection of large-scale data engineering and intelligent insight discovery.

Just in his early 20s, Lachu is already a standout talent in the field, and I have no doubt he will excel in any endeavor he chooses to pursue. His work ethic, intelligence, and potential make him a strong asset to any organization or academic institution.

I am pleased to confirm that Mr. Kelden Dradul Dorji worked as a junior software engineer focused on business analytics at Bhutan Data Scientists Pvt Ltd for 2 years between 2017 and 2019.
 
He provided valuable contributions in software coding, data analytics, and UX design on the following projects:
• Yarkay Inventory Management System
• Yarkay Rental Management System
• Royal Thimphu College Data dive
• Test work for TB detection system
• Occupational Integrated Database Exposure Assessment System (OccIDEAS)
• Royal Monetary Authority’s data dive
• Multirational Pvt Ltd’s RPA project
 
Kelden is independent in his own learning and always completed his assigned tasks on time. 

Kelden is a passionate technologist and displayed advanced insights on the multiple facets of a project, from client interaction to the project management.
 
Kelden is highly interested in machine learning and has taken initiative of our test work for TB detection system as the lead developer. 

Kelden’s intellectual curiosity and willingness to learn are commendable. He exhibits an insatiable thirst for knowledge, consistently seeking out new challenges and opportunities for growth. His ability to adapt to change and acquire new skills swiftly is a testament to his resilience and determination.

Should you require any further information or have any questions, please do not hesitate to contact me.

recommendee.occupation: Full Stack AI Developer | Let's build from zero to 10 million users
